data.title: Northwestern University
data.text:
Facility Usage

The Block Museum can at times partner on facility usage for arts and cultural events. Priority use of the Block facility is given to requests that are in keeping with the Blockâ€™s teaching and learning mission. Museum audiences, Northwestern departments, and members of the general public interested in facility use for private events should fill out the form below, or contact Senior Business Administrator, Jeff Smith, at jeffsmith@northwestern.edu or 847.467.3969.

Please note that the museum does not currently rent for weddings or private party usage. Availability is subject to the museum programming schedule.
